hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Have you read any good books lately? segurex sildenafil 50mg For fighter pilots, a HUD is not a gimmick. It is a lifesaver. Even so, when the time came to design the F-35âs cockpit, Lockheed Martin dispensed with the HUD in favor of a complex helmet-mounted display (H.M.D.), which in many ways is the centerpiece of the Joint Strike Fighter. The new system displays mission systems and targeting data inside the helmetâs visor and gives the pilot something akin to X-ray vision thanks to the âdistributed aperture systemâ that weaves together disparate feeds from those outward-facing cameras embedded in the airframe and projects a single image inches from a pilotâs eyes.
